channel.title: RS2 server simple codes
channel.description: I suggest that there should be another board titled "RS2 Server Codes" for all those codes that are really simple such as, autospawns, gfx's, emotes, item spawns, commands, ect. These do not really fit in with the tutorials section because anyone can do these and yet some of them are allowed in the tutorials section like autospawns however commands are not.

item.title: RS2 server simple codes
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:

This belongs in Help Because…
Anyway i Agree
Post it to a mod, And btw this’ll get locked.

Read full topic
